direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle file loading and parsing with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods parse input streams and handle character sets similarly.
Both methods involve detecting and handling character sets, making them interchangeable in certain contexts.
Both methods handle the opening and processing of input streams from files.
Both methods involve parsing and validating character sets, handling similar exceptions.

enhanced_by.reason: The input stream needs to be opened before parsing, similar to how it's done in streamParser.
Character set detection is required before parsing, similar to the setup in streamParser.
Parsing the input stream is a direct follow-up action after setting up the stream and detecting the charset.
Validation of the detected charset is a necessary assertion after parsing the stream.
Extracting the charset from the content type can be used to verify the correctness of the detected charset.
